title: How to stop your spouse spying on you or your phone
description: Social Media Spying. Risks: your social media accounts can be used to spy, stalk or monitor your activities, your movements and your communications with friends. Social media can also be misused to harass you or even impersonate you. 1. Consider deleting all or some of your social media accounts. 2. Change all your passwords on all social media sites.

description: Criminal Penalties for Spying. Some forms of spying are violations of state or federal law. For example, if your spouse is found guilty of violating the Federal Wire Tapping Act, at a very minimum he or she can be ordered to stop the illegal acts.

title: How to stop my spouse from spying on my cell phone through ...
description: Jun 16, 2018   Technology-wise, easiest way of stopping your spouse (or anyone else) from spying your network usage through wifi router is to disable the wifi functionality while at home. title: Husband spying on me with iCloud? | Grown Up Geek
description: At the top under your name it will tell you how long it has been since you were last on. See if the time matches the time you left.
